meanings.sent1: The boy looked undershirted in his white tee.
meanings.sent2: She felt comfortable in her undershirted outfit.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he was so undershirted, he could start a fashion trend.
meanings.sent4: The undershirted man stood out in the crowd of tank tops.
meanings.sent5: The undershirted look gave him a classic style.

meanings.definition: Having an undershirt on underneath clothing.
meanings.sent1: The undershirted gentleman adjusted his tie.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to stay warm by staying undershirted.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked undershirted with its fur sticking out.
meanings.sent4: The undershirted layer provided extra warmth on chilly days.
meanings.sent5: He always felt cozy and secure when undershirted.
